intro: Limeum glaberrimum, commonly known as the smooth lime, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its smooth, glabrous leaves and clusters of small, yellowish-white flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, well-drained soils and thrives in temperate climates. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous small, dry seeds. Limeum glaberrimum is often cultivated for its ornamental value and has historical uses in traditional medicine.
